properties.name: byteOrder
properties.default: The OS native byte order is used by default. See <Titanium.Codec.getNativeByteOrder>

properties.name: length
properties.default: 0, unless `value` is specified, in which case the length of the encoded data is used.

properties.name: type
properties.summary: The type of data encoding to use with value.
properties.default: <Titanium.Codec.CHARSET_UTF8> if `value` is a String, If `value` is a Number, this argument is required

properties.name: value
properties.summary: An initial value which will be encoded and placed in the buffer. If value is a Number, type must also be set. (this is simply a convenient way of calling encodeString or encodeNumber and placing the encoded value in the returned buffer.)
